results.title: I am Sophie hear me rawr!!...meow
results.creator_credit: Sophie Obradovic, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Sophie Obradovic and her brother Nathan are a dynamic duo! Obradovic talks about her strong connection to her family and friends, her ethnic identity and being an ‘emo’.

results.title: My first year
results.creator_credit: Louise Bryant, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Louise shares her experiences and the three most important lessons she learnt in her first year as a secondary teacher. These are the things they don’t teach you at uni; survival, rewards and pleasant surprises.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Louise Bryant, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Behind the scenes
results.creator_credit: Tim Kanoa, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Six Indigenous Youth Leadership Programme scholars were invited to participate in a Digital Storytelling workshop at ACMI in June 2007. Here is a glimpse behind the scenes of the workshop and interviews with the participants on their experience.

results.title: Adventures in the Strait
results.creator_credit: Sorogo Mills, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: The rope that linked the dinghy to the boat had snapped. It was up to me to fix it. Sorogo’s story about an experience that showed him what he was really made of.

results.title: This is a story about the land we live on
results.creator_credit: Alisha Dark, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: This land has cared for our ancestors for generations and now it’s our turn to care for it. We need to take responsibility. This story is about Alisha’s personal connection with the land.
results.title_for_label: This is a story about the land we live on
results.creator_credit_for_label: Alisha Dark, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Straford video memories
results.creator_credit: John Straford, Frank Straford and Inala Video
results.brief_description:
Video memories of the Victorian west coast and bushfires in the north-east produced by the Straford family.
“Gone to blazes” contains footage broadcast by national and commercial TV channels during the course of the devastating bushfires that ravaged the Victorian north-east early in 2003.
results.creator_credit_for_label: John Straford, Frank Straford and Inala Video
results.description:
Video memories of the Victorian west coast and bushfires in the north-east produced by the Straford family.
“Gone to blazes” contains footage broadcast by national and commercial TV channels during the course of the devastating bushfires that ravaged the Victorian north-east early in 2003.
description_for_label:
Video memories of the Victorian west coast and bushfires in the north-east produced by the Straford family.
“Gone to blazes” contains footage broadcast by national and commercial TV channels during the course of the devastating bushfires that ravaged the Victorian north-east early in 2003.

results.title: Rabbit control. Part 2: follow up
results.creator_credit: Ian Blythman, John Atkins and Dept of Conservation, Forests and Land
results.brief_description: Part 2 of a programme designed to control the rabbit population and their adverse effects on farming. This episode, which is narrated by Maurie Fields, looks at fumigation, destruction of habitat, baiting and shooting with follow-up procedures to ensure successful control of rabbit populations.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Ian Blythman, John Atkins and Dept of Conservation, Forests and Land
results.description: Part 2 of a programme designed to control the rabbit population and their adverse effects on farming.
